text: William Baumgartner is professor of surgery at the Johns Hopkins University School of Medicine and executive director of the American Board of Thoracic Surgery. He is known for his work in neurological protection during cardiac surgery. He was president of the International Society for Heart and Lung Transplantation for 1996–1997. ==References== ==External links== *https://www.hopkinsmedicine.org/profiles/results/directory/profile/0000238/william- baumgartner Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:American transplant surgeons Category:Johns Hopkins University faculty
title: William Baumgartner
